summary: This document is an email correspondence from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley, discussing a partnership and requesting direction on a matter. The email indicates a level of confidentiality and suggests a business relationship.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, indicating a business relationship with Jes Staley.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the recipient of the email, involved in a discussion about a partnership with Epstein.

connections.description: Epstein is reaching out to Staley regarding a partnership and seeking direction on a matter.

keyFacts: The email was sent on July 24, 2009.
Jeffrey Epstein is discussing a partnership with Jes Staley.
The email indicates a request for direction on a matter, suggesting a business relationship.
The document contains a confidentiality request by JPMorgan Chase.
